```{r meta-details, include=FALSE, results = 'asis'}
meta() %>%
  meta_social(
    title = "ALA LABS",
    description = "Demo projects, experiments and debugging data from the Atlas of Living Australia",
    url = "https://labs.ala.org.au",
    image = "https://labs.ala.org.au/galah_image.png",
    image_alt = "Labs - Atlas of Living Australia",
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = "Atlas of Living Australia",
    twitter_card_type = "summary",
    twitter_creator = "@atlaslivingaust"
  )
```

# We Value:

```{r, layout="l-screen-inset", echo = FALSE}
# find icons at https://fontawesome.com/v5.15/icons?d=gallery&p=2

tags$div(class = "values-row",
         
create_values_box1(
  value = "\   Openness",
  icon = "fas fa-book-open",
  text = "Data are most useful when they are widely available and easy to use. We try to encourage the sharing of tools that make it easier to use data from the Atlas of Living Australia"
),

create_values_box2(
  value = "\   Scientific Transparency",
  icon = "fas fa-atom",
  text = "Transparency is necessary to reproducible science. We encourage that decisions, methods and deviations in our workflow are clear and transparent from the planning phase, to the retrieval and analysis of data, to the final scientific article"
),

create_values_box3(
  value = "\   Robust methods",
  icon = "far fa-chart-bar",
  text = "No method or analytic procedure is perfect. We value consideration for strengths and limitations of each method or analysis to help choose the methods that provide robust, reliable results"
)

)
```
